subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Garmin-Cervelo, the team that won the Tour’s time trial in Stage 2 Sunday, is managed by Jonathan Vaughters, a vocal opponent of performance-enhancing drug use in cycling.
snippet: Garmin-Cervelo, the team that won the Tour’s time trial in Stage 2 Sunday, is managed by Jonathan Vaughters, a vocal opponent of performance-enhancing drug use in cycling.
